voxtaAction.name: sextoy_control
voxtaAction.description: Controls the stroking motion of a sextoy that is stimulating {{user}}.

arguments.name: motion_state
arguments.description: Whether the device should move. Use 'start' to start motion or 'stop' to stop all motion.

arguments.name: stroke_type
arguments.description: Stroke pattern to use. Allowed values: 'sine', 'bounce', or 'double_bounce'.

arguments.name: speed
arguments.description: Stroke speed as a percentage from '10' (slowest) to '100' (fastest).
